Articles.Content:
You don\'t it has a one-time charge.

How do you destroy a Nokia phone?

With a river.

How do you enter a secret vault?

By looking the employees deep in the eyes and saying \'\'pretty please?\'\'

How do you assemble an IKEA table?

Ask the 'CMC Carpenters' to try and do it, only to attempt to euthanize it.

Oops. I forgot the question.

How do you celebrate Passover?

What do you say to people who don\'t edit their posts?

EDIT YOW POSTS!

FUK U

How to you find Equestria

Ask princess Celestia.

How to put out fire?

Find cloudsdale first, ten follow the rain clouds.

How xos grove avoid laughin when his mother dies?

I don\'t laugh because my face has been transformed into a expression-less brick.

How to not know anything at the end of semester?

Study and pay Attention in class

How to save kerbals from da space kraken

Don\'t bother going there?

How do you annoy someone, on top of quoting them in this forum game?

Don\'t bother going there?

How do you escape an Old People\'s home?

Beat your attendant with a cane.

I see you forgot to ask a question...

Anyway,

Who murdered all the Jews in World War II?

um...motzart?

How many times have you jumped of a cliff?

Four(I\'m not a brony, never even watched it)

How do you discover all knowledge?

By attacking a keyboard when the computer\'s focus is the Google search bar.

What color poo did you eat yesterday?

Uhh... Blue?

When will Caesar become a real boy?

When God wants it too(wait so i am a man and i havent became a boy?

How many inches long is my d*ck?

Let\'s see... I think 47?

What\'s the last thing you hear before you die?

What\'s up, Doc?

=P

What word causes the most awkward silences?

Hello.

How do you get past a defense system of a heavily guarded facility?

With a cardboard box.

How do you keep your mom from eating your candy?

With a large net.

How do you cause WWIII?

By letting a mouse loose.

How beautiful is space?

Beautiful... (Drool)

How long does it take for me to think of how to make this Awkward?
